content.title: Azoless, the Mysterious Twilight Guide
content.body:
Azoless is quite the enigma, as we arenâ€™t sure what their species or gender is.
Her Majesty has hand-picked Azoless to guide you through the Twilight Realm though, so it is clear she trusts them a great deal.
They are an expert on the Twilight Realm, and has most likely lived there for their entire life. I suggest you take caution, as they may know more than they let on...
